price: Dájúdájú Àwa rán Òjíṣẹ́ kan níṣẹ́ si yín (tí ó jẹ́) olùjẹ́rìí lórí yín gẹ́gẹ́ bí A ṣe rán Òjíṣẹ́ kan níṣẹ́ sí Fir‘aon.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ilaykum rasūlan shāhidan ʿalaykum kamā arsalnā ilā fir'ʿawna rasūlan
